attributes.action: Save the Sittingbourne & Kemsley Light Railway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sittingbourne and Kemsley light Railway in Kent faces immediate closure after its landlord refuses to renew the 2ft 6in gauge railway's lease. The final public trains could run on Boxing Day this year if nothing is done to stop the Heritage Railway Association's 2008 award winner (small groups) from being closed.
